original_text: Then Zedekiah son of Kenaanah went up and slapped Micaiah in the face. “Which way did the spirit from the Lord go when he went from me to speak to you?” he asked.
korean_text: 그나아나의 아들 시드기야가 가까이 와서 미가야의 뺨을 치며 이르되 여호와의 영이 나를 떠나 어디로 가서 네게 말씀하더냐 하는지라

sentences.original_text: Then Zedekiah son of Kenaanah went up
and slapped Micaiah in the face
Which way did the spirit from the Lord go
sentences.korean_translation: 주께로부터 온 영은 어느 길로 갔습니까

sentences.original_text: when he went from me to speak to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나에게서 너에게 말하러 갈 때
